mapper.sql: A.UID AS UID,A.SAS_STOCK_NO AS SASSTOCKNO,A.CHG_TMS_CNT AS CHGTMSCNT,A.SAS_STOCK_SEQNO AS SASSTOCKSEQNO,A.SAS_DCL_SEQNO AS SASDCLSEQNO, A.ORIACT_GDS_SEQNO AS ORIACTGDSSEQNO,A.GDS_MTNO AS GDSMTNO,A.GDECD AS GDECD,A.GDS_NM AS GDSNM,A.GDS_SPCF_MODEL_DESC AS GDSSPCFMODELDESC, B.UNIT_NAME AS DCLUNITCD,E.UNIT_NAME AS LAWFUNITCD,A.SECD_LAWF_UNITCD AS SECDLAWFUNITCD,D.COUNTRY_NA AS NATCD,A.DCL_UPRC_AMT AS DCLUPRCAMT, A.DCL_TOTAL_AMT AS DCLTOTALAMT,A.USD_STAT_TOTAL_AMT AS USDSTATTOTALAMT,C.CURR_NAME AS DCLCURRCD,A.LAWF_QTY AS LAWFQTY,A.SECD_LAWF_QTY AS SECDLAWFQTY, A.WT_SF_VAL AS WTSFVAL,A.FST_SF_VAL AS FSTSFVAL,A.SECD_SF_VAL AS SECDSFVAL,A.DCL_QTY AS DCLQTY,A.GROSS_WT AS GROSSWT,A.NET_WT AS NETWT,A.USE_CD AS USECD, F.DUTY_SPEC AS LVYRLFMODECD,A.UCNS_VERNO AS UCNSVERNO,A.CLY_MARKCD AS CLYMARKCD,A.ACTL_PASS_QTY AS ACTLPASSQTY,A.PASSPORT_USED_QTY AS PASSPORTUSEDQTY, A.REPLACE_QTY AS REPLACEQTY,A.RLT_GDS_SEQNO AS RLTGDSSEQNO,A.RMK AS RMK,A.ETPS_PREENT_NO AS ETPSPREENTNO,A.COP_ENT_NO AS COPENTNO, A.STOCK_TYPECD AS STOCKTYPECD,A.MTPCK_ENDPRD_TYPECD AS MTPCKENDPRDTYPECD,A.OPERATE_TYPE AS OPERATETYPE,A.SEQ_NO AS SEQNO,A.CHK_TIME AS CHKTIME
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM SAS_STOCK_CUS_DT A LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_CUS_UNIT B ON B.UNIT_CODE = A.DCL_UNITCD LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_CUS_CURR C ON C.CURR_CODE = A.DCL_CURRCD LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_CUS_COUNTRY D ON D.COUNTRY_CO = A.NATCD LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_CUS_UNIT E ON E.UNIT_CODE = A.LAWF_UNITCD LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_CUS_LEVYMODE F ON F.DUTY_MODE = A.LVYRLF_MODECD WHERE A.SEQ_NO = #{seqNo}
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(DCL_QTY),0) AS DCL_QTY FROM SAS_STOCK_CUS_DT A LEFT JOIN SAS_STOCK_CUS B ON A.SEQ_NO = B.SEQ_NO WHERE B.SAS_DCL_NO = #{sasDclNo} AND A.SAS_DCL_SEQNO = #{sasDclSeqno}
